CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Champion - Lovely LaVerne Sayre and her beautiful horse, Double Trouble, was one of the Bleu Ribbon winners for her splendid horsemanship. Many prominent local figures aided materially is making Pittsburgh's first indoor horse show at Hunt Armory a real success.  The show was well attended and supported, marking another milestone in uplift of our community's organization. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of LaVerne Sayre wearing patterned jacket with side pockets, holding feathered whip, posed in front of plaid blanket hanging in stable in Hunt Armory during home show
